main.name: Hello, I'm Najmus Shakib.
main.description: MERN Stack Developer and Database Designer
main.bio: My name is Najmus Shakib and I am an experienced full-stack web developer and professional tutor. I have skilled with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, JQuery, React js, Node js, Express js, MongoDB, MySQL, Next js. You can share your project with me. I am interested in solving any web-related problem. I don't want to waste the time of my client. I feel real concern about my clients, their feedbacks, their deadlines, and the quality they need. I will try to give the best quality.
main.contactmessage: To contact me, message me, or contact me using social media platforms. If you do not want to be contacted, you can hire me directly through the International Marketplaces.

education.description: I have 4 years of good experience in university life and have a clear idea of C, C++, Java, Data structure, Algorithms, and Networking. In the web design part, I have the skills to design any kind of website. My design must be responsive in all devices, pixel perfect, w3c valid code, clean coding, SEO friendly, and cross-browser compatible.
